title: Deconflict GeoPointField and BKD LatLonField Encoding, Decoding, and Tolerance
description: Follow up to LUCENE-6956, BKD based LatLonField and postings based GeoPointField should use a consistent lat/lon encoding/decoding method to ensure consistent round-off error.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: Nick, if you would, please categorize your spatial issues as-such ("Component" in JIRA).  It helps to find these issues within JIRA.  I didn't bring this up until now because only recently did we decide to put these sandbox pieces into spatial-named modules.  BTW I think you can do this in-bulk for the open ones.
